entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How can I help you today?

Yeah, hi. I want to return a VeloBand Pulse. I bought it a little over two weeks ago and it's just not working out for me. The readings are all over the place and it's constantly disconnecting from my phone.
I understand. I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble with your VeloBand Pulse. I can certainly help you with a return. To start, can I get your order number, please?
Ugh, seriously? Okay, one sec... It's #VF7892345. Look, I don't have all day for this. I just want to send this thing back and get my money back. Is that going to be a problem?
Thank you. Let me pull up your order. Okay, I see the VeloBand Pulse here. Our standard return policy is 90 days for most items, and it looks like you're well within that timeframe.
90 days? Great! Because the website made it sound like I only had, like, 10 days. That's why I was calling right away.

No worries at all! The 10 days may have been a misunderstanding, but our general return policy allows for a full 90 days. I can go ahead and process the return for you. We'll send you a prepaid shipping label.
Okay, finally! So I just print the label, stick it on the box, and send the VeloBand Pulse back?

Exactly! Once we receive the returned smart watch, we'll process your refund. It should appear in your account within 7-10 business days. I'll also send a confirmation email with the return label and instructions. You don't need to speak with a manager; I can handle everything for you right now.
Fantastic! Thank you so much. You've been a huge help.
You're very welcome! I'm glad I could assist you. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
Have a great day, and thank you for choosing VeloFit!
